Introduction

Yim Siwan is a South Korean singer and actor under Plum A&C. He began his entertainment career as a member of the boy group ZE:A and eventually debuted as an actor through the hit drama "The Moon Embracing the Sun," launching him to fame.

After that, Siwan continued to star as supporting characters in dramas "Man From the Equator," "Standby," and "Triangle," until he landed his lead role in "Misaeng." Since then, Siwan has continued to take on lead roles and eventually became one of the most popular actors of his generation.
